p: Alternatively, a great number of compounds (more than 250), derived from Curcuma longa L. were tested and two of them, namely ( a) the C1 (1E,6E)-1,2,6,7-tetrahydroxy-1,7-bis(4-hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)hepta-1,6-diene-3,5-dione) and ( b) C2 (4Z,6E)-1,5-dihydroxy-1,7-bis(4-hydroxyphenyl)hepta-4,6-dien-3-one) revealed a better binding score (−9.08 and −8.07 kcal/mol, respectively) with respect to the control shikonin and lopinavir (around −5.4 kcal/mol) [132].
